page.title: 03FAWCETTS VOLVO GARAGE
page.content: Fawcetts is a privately owned Volvo sales and service garage employing 14 people. It is run by a managing director and has been there for 35 years. Both sales and service are equally important. The average service or repair cost Â£100. New Volvos range from Â£6,000 to Â£15,000. Ten years ago the cheapest was about Â£2,000. Most popular models today are 5 door hatch-backs and estates. Supplies of spares or new cars arrive daily. They come by sea and road from Sweden. Fawcetts are inspected regularly by Volvo inspectors who check standards of workmanship. The manager feels the site is a good one but could be improved by having bigger workshops and better access.
